00024 void initInterpolzeroderivative(interpolpara* ipp, int n, double h, 
00025                                 double* x, double* f)
00026 {
00027   ipp->n = n;
00028   ipp->h = h;
00029   
00030   ipp->T = malloc(n*sizeof(double));
00031   ipp->G = malloc(n*sizeof(double));
00032   ipp->B = malloc(n*sizeof(double));
00033   ipp->C = malloc(n*sizeof(double));
00034   ipp->D = malloc(n*sizeof(double));
00035 
00036   int i;
00037   for (i=0; i<n; i++)
00038     ipp->T[i] = x[i];
00039   for (i=0; i<n; i++)
00040     ipp->G[i] = f[i];
00041 
00042   int IENT=1;
00043   double END1=0.0; double ENDN=0.0;
00044   FORTRAN(dcsint)(&IENT, &h, &n, ipp->T, ipp->G, &END1, &ENDN, 
00045                   ipp->B, ipp->C, ipp->D);
00046 }

00049 void freeInterpol(interpolpara* ipp)
00050 {
00051   free(ipp->T);
00052   free(ipp->G);
00053   free(ipp->B);
00054   free(ipp->C);
00055   free(ipp->D);
00056 }
00057 
00058 
00059 inline double sqr(double x) { return x*x; }
00060 inline double cbe(double x) { return x*x*x; }
00061 
00062 double calcInterpol(const interpolpara* p, double x)
00063 {
00064   int i=0;
00065 
00066   if (x < p->T[0] || x > p->T[p->n-1]) {
00067     fprintf(stderr, "interpol: argument %f outside interpolation range\n", x);
00068     return 0.0;
00069   }
00070 
00071   while (i < p->n - 1) {
00072     if (x <= p->T[i+1])
00073       break;
00074     i++;
00075   }
00076 
00077   return (p->G[i] + 
00078           p->B[i]*(x - p->T[i]) +
00079           p->C[i]*sqr(x - p->T[i]) +
00080           p->D[i]*cbe(x - p->T[i]));
00081 }
